translator writing systems a critical review of recent efforts to automate the writing translators programming languages is presented the formal study syntax and its application translator are discussed in section ii various approaches automating post syntactic semantic aspects iii several related topics iv cacm february 1968 feldman j gries d compiler metacompiler semantics directed meta assembler macroprocessor parser analysis generator 4 1 10 12 22 5 23 ca680201 jb 1978 2 02 pm 249 1781 254 267 272 1046 1062 1072 1086 1102 1105 1109 1121 1132 1139 1140 1141 1142 1188 1215 1223 1225 1234 1263 1265 1270 1306 1323 1350 1358 1379 1380 1396 1399 1425 1453 1464 1469 1484 1486 1491 1496 1498 1503 1530 1541 1542 1552 1565 1612 1613 1614 1626 1646 1647 1659 1665 1683 1693 1708 1767 1768 1787 1788 1792 1807 1824 1825 1826 1836 1852 1854 1860 1861 1945 1947 1949 1988 1989 321 364 2015 2034 2059 2060 2061 2083 2082 2091 2110 2112 2126 2150 2152 2156 2168 2175 2178 2179 2228 2249 2252 2256 2299 2314 2317 2325 2326 2341 2340 2356 2342 2376 2470 2534 405 2541 2546 435 437 438 2579 463 464 483 491 2603 2618 2645 2650 2652 2684 2698 2708 2719 2732 2733 2736 2820 2824 2833 2842 2929 2934 2982 2986 557 560 583 584 3044 3045 3069 3073 3093 3094 3155 3184 627 631 632 637 642 644 653 669 679 680 691 720 729 759 761 762 763 795 799 123 140 919 945 949 989 196 990 1007 1131 1149 1198 1303 205 224 1366 288 1421 1460 1462 1463 1468 1467 1477 1531 1535 1601 1602 1641 316 381 398 2127 2187 2545 404 410 11 3188 600 6 1155 1191 1324 1487 1527 1572 1739 1748 1749 1753 1856 378 2148 2423 2556 2786 408 577
